Sentencas: In this paper, a theoretical analysis of an ejector for micro combined heat and power systems based on Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) for small-scale residential applications is presented.
Titulo: Ejector design and performance evaluation for recirculation of anode gas in a micro combined heat and power systems based on solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: A novel detailed procedure for the ejector designing is provided and its effectiveness is validated through a comparison with testing results.
Titulo: Ejector design and performance evaluation for recirculation of anode gas in a micro combined heat and power systems based on solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The ejector geometry is analysed in terms of component efficiency.
Titulo: Ejector design and performance evaluation for recirculation of anode gas in a micro combined heat and power systems based on solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The SOFC system performance with regard the recirculation of anode gas is finally discussed.
Titulo: Ejector design and performance evaluation for recirculation of anode gas in a micro combined heat and power systems based on solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Results show that fuel inlet temperature and the diameter of the ejector mixing chamber of the ejector largely affect the ejector performance.
Titulo: Ejector design and performance evaluation for recirculation of anode gas in a micro combined heat and power systems based on solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: A large mixing chamber diameter allows a high entrainment ratio but causes a worse ejector efficiency suggesting a highest efficiency still ensuring the required entrainment ratio.
Titulo: Ejector design and performance evaluation for recirculation of anode gas in a micro combined heat and power systems based on solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: At system level, it is shown that the degree of fuel pre-reforming affects the recirculation ratio.
Titulo: Ejector design and performance evaluation for recirculation of anode gas in a micro combined heat and power systems based on solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Besides, if anode gas recirculation is implemented the system capital cost decreases due to reduction in size of ancillary components.
Titulo: Ejector design and performance evaluation for recirculation of anode gas in a micro combined heat and power systems based on solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The high electrical efficiency achieved by the system reduces the heat output and makes it more attractive when less heat is demanded.
Titulo: Ejector design and performance evaluation for recirculation of anode gas in a micro combined heat and power systems based on solid oxide fuel cell
Ejector design and performance evaluation for recirculation of anode gas in a micro combined heat and power systems based on solid oxide fuel cell
